alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cullman County through 245 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bangor to near Smith Dam. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dodge City, Garden City, Colony, Wilburn, Bremen, Arkadelphia, Black Bottom and Smith Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
